name: StickMan: Bounce
description:
StickMan: Bounce is a game where you are on "StickMan apocalipse" an need to save the world (Or save yourself).

You are playing as the last one alive and trying to... (Right now, the game, is arcade)

Now there is no upgrades, gears, or inventory but this is just alpha testing, so it´s not gonna be perfect. Anyway, every donation speeds up the progress a little, or at least encourages me to create more updates.

GLHF!
